last_episode_to_air.name: Oh Brother!
last_episode_to_air.overview: The ghosts and ghouls of the Orlock are spooked when a mysterious visitor appears and reveals a tie to Bunnicula's past.

name: Bunnicula
overview: A dark comedic adventure about the titular Bunnicula, a vampire rabbit, Mina, his owner, and her two pets, Chester the cat and Harold the dog.  Instead of blood, Bunnicula feeds on carrots to sustain himself which gives him super abilities which come in handy on his and his friends escapades.

episodes.name: Mumkey Business
episodes.overview: When Chester is tired of Bunnicula's ghoulish mischief he decides to lock him back in the cellar. But this proves to be a mistake when a mummy monkey attacks the apartment.

episodes.name: Walking Fish
episodes.overview: A magical harmonica attracts zombie fish to the Orlock apartments and Bunnicula tries to stop them from scaring Mina.

episodes.name: Spider Lamb
episodes.overview: After Harold comes home from surgery after eating a soccer ball, Chester and Bunnicula commit to helping their friend get some rest and read him a bedtime story. But after a monstrous hybrid of a spider and a lamb emerges from the book, they’re afraid their immobilized friend will be eaten! Bunnicula and Chester team up to save their friend.

episodes.name: Alligator Tears
episodes.overview: When a ghostly Southern alligator looking for her missing earring is haunting the sewers spreads a crying curse through the apartment, only Bunnicula can set things right before everyone drowns in their own waterworks.

episodes.name: Muddy Harry
episodes.overview: After Mina and her friends try to invoke Bloody Mary in the hall mirror, Harold discovers that they’ve actually conjured a mud monster that he’s super excited to introduce to his friends.

episodes.name: Garlicked
episodes.overview: When Chester feeds Bunnicula garlic as a way to remove his vampire powers, the bunny’s fur falls off and he becomes a cute, dancing skeleton. But after Chester realizes that Mina’s heart will break if she realizes Bunnicula is a real vampire, he and Harold must cover up the problem.

episodes.name: Whooo Is... The Knight Owl
episodes.overview: When Chester realizes that Bunnicula isn't enough to protect the Orlock Apartments from supernatural forces, Bunnicula introduces his friends to the Knight Owl — a dedicated defender of the downtrodden, but the family's new protector seems to be a little too good at his job.

episodes.name: Squeaky Doom
episodes.overview: When the spirit of an evil Viking warrior returns to life in the body of Harold's squeaky dog toy, it wants revenge against the rabbit that trapped it in the first place.

episodes.name: Son of Bunnicula
episodes.overview: After Chester assumes that an eggplant will cause Bunnicula to lay a monster egg, Bunnicula decides to pull a prank on Chester and dresses up as his own baby.

episodes.name: Evil Cat Videos
episodes.overview: Chester isn't acting like himself lately, but the trouble doesn't really start until Bunnicula realizes that Chester has been watching a possessed video cassette.

episodes.name: Chester’s Shop of Horrors
episodes.overview: Chester takes a shine to a sinister Venus flytrap because the plant scares Bunnicula, but the plant has plans of its own!

episodes.name: Bride of Bunnicula
episodes.overview: Mina builds a vegetable monster for her science project, but when a blast of static electricity brings the creature to life, Bunnicula instantly falls for her charms.

episodes.name: Vampire Rabbit Season
episodes.overview: Fluffy the Vampire Pointer sets out to vanquish Bunnicula once and for all when she suspects Mina and her pets are under his control.

episodes.name: Curse of the Weredude
episodes.overview: When Chester desires to be human so he can impress Mina, he gets more than he bargained for after Bunnicula introduces him to Patches the Weredude.

episodes.name: Nevermoar
episodes.overview: Bunnicula and Chester go into the internet to stop an evil raven from feasting on the anger and hatred of everyone online.

episodes.name: Hole of the Unworthy
episodes.overview: A disfigured guinea pig visits Bunnicula and has plans to banish Chester to the Hole of the Unworthy.

episodes.name: Adopt a Vampire
episodes.overview: Fed up with Bunnicula's shenangians, Chester decides to put him up for adoption, but when Harold ends up being taken away by a kooky old lady, the two must put their differences aside and save him.

episodes.name: Haunted Dog House
episodes.overview: Mina leaves the pets out overnight in the spooky old dog house, not realizing that the doghouse is haunted by the ghost of a playful puppy from the 1930s, who won't rest until someone plays with him.

episodes.name: Lucky Vampire’s Foot
episodes.overview: Chester steals Bunnicula's foot to improve his luck; Bunnicula's luck gets worse and worse.

episodes.name: Ghost Chef
episodes.overview: Bunnicula summons the ghost of Mina's cooking idol to aid her.

episodes.name: Catula
episodes.overview: After Bunnicula accidentally bites Chester, the cat is convinced he's also becoming a creature of the night.

episodes.name: Dreamcatcher
episodes.overview: Mina is plagued by nightmares, so Bunnicula pulls Chester and Harold in her dreams to help solve the problem.

episodes.name: Ghost Pepper
episodes.overview: Bunnicula consumes a spicy ghost pepper, then starts burning up everything in sight; Harold and Chester try to cool things off.

episodes.name: Dating for Dummies
episodes.overview: Bunnicula and his friends realize Mina's dad has been played for a dummy when he goes on a date with a female ventriloquist.

episodes.name: Sunday Bunnday
episodes.overview: Bunnicula finds himself far from the Orlock Apartments at sunrise, and desperately attempts to return home before the sun's rays turn him to ash.

episodes.name: Scaraoke
episodes.overview: After Mina performs some horrendous karaoke on an old blues singer’s song, Bunnicula intervenes to stop the blues singer’s ghost from ruining Mina's life.

episodes.name: Bearshee
episodes.overview: A screaming spectral bear named Siobhan arrives at the apartments, and Bunnicula discovers she is scared of non-supernatural creatures.

episodes.name: Beware Apartment 13!
episodes.overview: Things begin to mysteriously disappear around the Orlock Apartments; the gang follows clues to the mysterious Mr. Molesbee in Apartment 13.

episodes.name: Puzzle Madness
episodes.overview: Trapped in Bunnicula's evil puzzle box, Chester and Harold must solve three puzzles before they can escape.

episodes.name: Return of the Curse of the Weredude
episodes.overview: Patches the Weredude enlists Chester to help him woo his girlfriend, but Chester falls for the same girl.

episodes.name: Collar Me Crazy
episodes.overview: The pets are thrilled when a silver collar turns Bunnicula into a kindhearted, totally normal rabbit.

episodes.name: Calendar Boys
episodes.overview: Chester and Harold try to stop a pet calendar photo shoot that threatens to expose Bunnicula's vampire secret.

episodes.name: Brussel Boy
episodes.overview: Mina's new friend, Russell, has a dark secret; can Bunnicula help the poor lad or will he simply eat him?

episodes.name: Vampire Tick
episodes.overview: When a vampire tick attaches itself to Harold's butt, Bunnicula has to remove it before bad stuff goes down.

episodes.name: Chestaroldcula
episodes.overview: After a magical artifact combines Chester, Harold and Bunnicula into one uberpet, they must find a way to unmesh themselves.

episodes.name: Never Been Scared
episodes.overview: When Mina wants to see a real ghost, her pets hire one to give her a little bit of a scare.

episodes.name: Family Portrait
episodes.overview: After an evil portrait swallows up Mina and her dad, the pets must find a way to break the spell.

episodes.name: My Imaginary Friend
episodes.overview: Mina's imaginary friend returns to her life; Bunnicula is set on a collision course with a supernatural creature he's never had to face before.

episodes.name: The Juicy Problem
episodes.overview: Chester feeds Bunnicula mixed vegetable juices to get him to clean the house.

episodes.name: Uninvited
episodes.overview: When Red Cap sets its sights on eating Mina and Becky for dinner, Bunnicula must save the day.

episodes.name: The Invisible Yam
episodes.overview: While Mina is away for the weekend, a depressed Bunnicula turns invisible after eating a very dry, rotten yam.

episodes.name: Indistinguishable from Magic
episodes.overview: Chester thinks Bunnicula is a robot made by aliens.

episodes.name: Pranks for the Memories
episodes.overview: A prank war unfolds between Chester and Bunnicula.

episodes.name: Revenge of the Return of the Curse of the Weredude
episodes.overview: When Patches decides to move in with Bunnicula and Harold, Chester knows that letting Mina's dad know about Patches' Were-Dude curse could be a problem.

episodes.name: On Mina’s Secret Service
episodes.overview: Harold must teach Chester how to be a 'secret service' animal if they are to rescue Bunnicula from some chipmunks, who have trapped him in their tree.

episodes.name: Cellarmander
episodes.overview: A flooded basement means trouble for Bunnicula and the others when a Cellarmander eats them one by one. Together, Harold, Chester, Patches, and the Mumkey must rescue Bunnicula when he is eaten.

episodes.name: The Eyes Have It
episodes.overview: Bunnicula and the others traverse the sewers to retrieve Bunnicula's eye, but sewer mermaids won't make it easy.

episodes.name: Chips and Salsa
episodes.overview: Mina and Marsha search the city for Bunnicula, who is having a party, so Harold and Chester try to locate him before Mina does.

episodes.name: Mark of the Mandrake
episodes.overview: Bunnicula eats a mystical mandrake root and takes the size of a human.

episodes.name: Down the Rabbit Hole
episodes.overview: Bunnicula helps a family of rabbits deal with a belligerent horse, who eats the rabbits of their carrots.

episodes.name: Cat Burgled
episodes.overview: When Chester and the other Orlock apartment cats are trapped in a mysterious dimension by a human-hating ghost cat, Bunnicula and Harold must to rescue him.

episodes.name: Goat Story
episodes.overview: Bunnicula's been framed for the crime of eating all the food in the fridge, so it's up to Chester and Harold to brush up on their detective skills and prove Bunnicula's innocence.

episodes.name: Three Heads Are Better Than One
episodes.overview: Harold wants to prove that he can be responsible when he takes Cerberus' place as gatekeeper of the underworld, but...it doesn't go too well.

episodes.name: Scott Free
episodes.overview: Bunnicula accidentally erases Scott's memory after the latter finds out about Bunnicula's secret, but also becomes rather intelligent. Chester and Harold use this to take advantage of Scott and make him cater to their every whim, but this also makes Mina miss the old Scott.

episodes.name: Area 50 Bunn
episodes.overview: A Government Agent searches Orlock Apartments for supernatural activity in order to save his job.

episodes.name: Legend of the Lucky Locket
episodes.overview: The pets find a magical locket that shows them the future, and they also learn that Mina will be in mortal danger when she becomes an adult. So, they decide to train her to be ready for any possible dangers to keep her safe.

episodes.name: Lord of the Lucky Locket
episodes.overview: The locket repairs itself and two ogres (John DiMaggio and Kevin Michael Richardson) decide to use it to capture Mina. Now, it's up to Bunnicula to save the future.

episodes.name: The Gingerdread Man
episodes.overview: Chester and Bunnicula discover Harold is the king from a world entirely made of candy. Now they have to face its former king: The Gingerdread Man.

episodes.name: Harold the Vampire Pointer
episodes.overview: When Fluffy the Vampire Pointer returns with a cold it's up to Harold and Bunnicula to stand in for her when a Vampire-Dog dares to challenge her.

episodes.name: Bunn on a Plane
episodes.overview: Bunnicula faces an ancient threat at 40,000 feet.

episodes.name: Jurassicnicula
episodes.overview: On a school field trip to the Nautral History Museum, Bunnicula drains an ancient plant and his 'lizard brain' starts to take over.

episodes.name: The Chocolate Vampire Bunny
episodes.overview: It's Easter, and when Bunnicula becomes chocolate after draining a cocoa bean, what will become of him when he is targeted by chocoholic children?

episodes.name: Cat-aclysm
episodes.overview: Bunnicula absorbs some catnip and becomes an evil cat with the urge of destroying everything. It's up to Chester and the other cats to turn Bunnicula back to normal.

episodes.name: Bunn Vs.
episodes.overview: Harold challenges Bunnicula to do about everything.

episodes.name: Bunzilla
episodes.overview: Bunnicula absorbs a seaweed and gets transformed into a Godzilla-like creature whom a village of squirrels is scared of.

episodes.name: Bunnicumoji
episodes.overview: Bunnicula must travel into the world of text messaging to save an embarrassing message that Mina sent to Scott.

episodes.name: The Curiosity Shop Killed the Cat
episodes.overview: Madame Polodouri, thinking Chester is a Vampire Cat, kidnaps and exploits him along with three other animals.

episodes.name: Beach Blanket Bunn
episodes.overview: Bunnicula (with Lugosi’s special blend of beans used as a temporary sunblock) has an adventure at the beachside.

episodes.name: Bunderworld
episodes.overview: Patches explains his origins, and how he first encountered Bunnicula.

episodes.name: Bunn in Space
episodes.overview: After Bunnicula consumes a cabbage, he's shot into space and must find a way to make it back to Earth.

episodes.name: Orlockdown
episodes.overview: When Count Orlock (The Original Vampire of the Orlock Apartment) returns to take control of Bunnicula and rule the world, Chester and Harold must do everything to stop him.

episodes.name: Prism Prison
episodes.overview: When Bunnicula, Chester and Harold have vampire-dance-party, Prism-clad guardians take them to a vampire prison where other vampires both human and animal vampires alike are held.

episodes.name: The Fruit Fly
episodes.overview: When Bunnicula attempts to eat an apple as his first time to consume a fruit instead of a vegetable, he accidentally consumes a fly who lived inside the apple with a group of fruit flies and as a result he starts turning into a Vampire Rabbit/Fly hybrid.

episodes.name: Lafitte’s Lucky Locket
episodes.overview: In this flashback episode, we learn how Bunnicula helped Jean Lafitte defeat the British with their magical locket.

episodes.name: Queen Wicked, the Wicked Queen
episodes.overview: After Bunnicula, Chester and Harold escape an old Fairy Tale book, they accidentally bring with them the Wicked Queen from Snow White.

episodes.name: Yellow Bellied Sound Sucker
episodes.overview: While playing with Bunnicula in the cellar, the pets accidentally release a bird monster that can literally steal sounds out of the air. Unable to make a sound, the pets must stop the monster before it silences the world!

episodes.name: How The West Was Bunn
episodes.overview: Bunnicula must help the rabbit family defeat a ghost rat in a game of mini golf.

episodes.name: A Dark and Stormy Night
episodes.overview: Patches uses a magical pen to bring his stories to life, but it endangers the town.

episodes.name: Blueberry Blues
episodes.overview: Bunnicula becomes depressed after he sucks a blueberry dry.

episodes.name: Iron Bunn
episodes.overview: Bunnicula sucks a vegetable that had been burned by an iron pot, causing his body to become metallic (apart from that it can attract metal objects like a magnet).

episodes.name: Mastering the Genie
episodes.overview: A genie enjoys turning wishes into nightmares.

episodes.name: Hare Club
episodes.overview: After getting magically awesome hairstyles, the pets realize there is a price for beauty.

episodes.name: The Maltese Bunny
episodes.overview: The pets use their detective skills to track down Mina's lost pony in the underworld.

episodes.name: Termites!
episodes.overview: Chester's perfect day isn't all it's cracked up to be.

episodes.name: Clone-icula
episodes.overview: Bunnicula accidentally creates clones of himself and it's up to Chester and Harold to find a way to get rid of them.

episodes.name: Hiccup in Smoke
episodes.overview: Chester and Harold must get rid of Bunnicula's hiccups before it's too late.

episodes.name: Purr-gatory
episodes.overview: Bunnicula tries to resist the urge to scare Chester.

episodes.name: Take the Bunny and Run
episodes.overview: Harold accidentally wins a dog race and the loser won't leave until he gets a rematch.

episodes.name: Any Witch Way
episodes.overview: A witch prevents Bunnicula from getting a hug from Mina.

episodes.name: Up to Our Ears
episodes.overview: The pets must help Bunnicula get back his ears from a bunch of street gangs.

episodes.name: Flunicula
episodes.overview: Bunnicula has the flu and its up to Chester, Harold and Lugosi to find a cure for Bunnicula.

episodes.name: So Campy
episodes.overview: When the pets go on a camping trip, Harold tries to convince Chester why camping is fun.

episodes.name: Wag the Dog
episodes.overview: Harold's tail keeps getting him into trouble.

episodes.name: Back in Thyme
episodes.overview: Bunnicula travels back in time to try and keep Mina's project from being destroyed.

episodes.name: Hat-Cat
episodes.overview: Bunnicula gives Chester a magical hat of bravery.

episodes.name: Poppet Master
episodes.overview: Harold willingly creates puppet dolls of Chester, Bunnicula and himself, with dire consequences...

episodes.name: The Party Animal
episodes.overview: Bunnicula enlists the help of a party expert in order to help loosen Chester up.

episodes.name: Good Luck Cricket
episodes.overview: A lucky cricket gives the pets good luck, But it comes at a price.

episodes.name: Monster-Con
episodes.overview: The pets go to a monster convention and realize Bunnicula's quite famous.

episodes.name: Skin Deep
episodes.overview: A monster scares the pets out of their skin.

episodes.name: The Thingy
episodes.overview: A doppelganger is on the loose in the Orlock Apartments.

episodes.name: A Vampire at the Vet
episodes.overview: The pets try to get out of the Vet's office before they examine Bunnicula.

episodes.name: Road Tripped
episodes.overview: The pets go on a road trip to a music festival in the underworld.

episodes.name: Oh Brother!
episodes.overview: The ghosts and ghouls of the Orlock are spooked when a mysterious visitor appears and reveals a tie to Bunnicula's past.
